Question: This person would carry his clear signature tone throughout his career.
Hints: By the time of Live-Evil in December 1970, this person's ensemble had transformed into a much more funk-oriented group.
This person considered releasing an entire album of pop songs and recorded dozens of them, but the idea was scrapped.
In 1974 and 1975, Columbia recorded three double-LP live this person albums: Dark Magus, Agharta, and Pangaea.
